mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT (sm.send_code) FROM send_m sm INNER JOIN send_d sd ON sm.send_code = sd.send_code WHERE sd.waybill_code = #{orderCode}

SELECT dc.departure_car_id, dc.send_user_code, dc.send_user, dc.create_time FROM departure_car dc INNER JOIN departure_send ds ON dc.departure_car_id = ds.departure_car_id WHERE ds.send_code IN
#{item}

SELECT create_site_code,receive_site_codes,send_user_code,transport_type ,create_time,route_type,capacity_code,departure_car_id,volume,weight FROM (SELECT dc.create_site_code,dc.receive_site_codes,dc.send_user_code,sm.transport_type ,dc.create_time,dc.capacity_code as route_type,ds.capacity_code,dc.departure_car_id,dc.volume,dc.weight FROM departure_car dc INNER JOIN departure_send ds ON dc.departure_car_id = ds.departure_car_id INNER JOIN send_m sm ON ds.send_code = sm.send_code WHERE dc.departure_car_id = #{carCode}) WHERE LIMIT 1

SELECT create_site_code,receive_site_codes,send_user_code,transport_type ,create_time,route_type,capacity_code,departure_car_id,volume,weight FROM (SELECT dc.create_site_code,dc.receive_site_codes,dc.send_user_code,sm.transport_type ,dc.create_time,dc.capacity_code as route_type,ds.capacity_code,dc.departure_car_id,dc.volume,dc.weight FROM send_m sm INNER JOIN departure_send ds ON sm.send_code = ds.send_code INNER JOIN departure_car dc ON ds.departure_car_id = dc.departure_car_id WHERE sm.box_code = #{boxCode}) WHERE LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into departure_car (departure_car_id, car_code, shields_car_code, send_user, send_user_code, create_site_code, create_time, create_user, create_user_code, update_time, yn, weight, volume, send_user_type,fingerprint,old_car_code,depart_type, run_number,receive_site_codes,capacity_Code) values (#{shieldsCarId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shieldsCarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sendUserType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{fingerprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldCarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{runNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveSiteCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capacityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql: departure_car_id, car_code, shields_car_code, send_user_code, send_user,send_user_code,create_site_code, create_time, create_user, create_user_code, update_time, yn, weight, volume, send_user_type
mapper.select: select SEQ_DEPARTURE_CAR.NEXTVAL as id from dual
